sre0100s.question: sre0100s
sre0100s.name: sre0100s
sre0100s.label: What about with you and [name of sibling]?

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: What about with you and [name of sibling]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es bei Dir und [Name des befragten Geschwisters]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: What about doing nice things like helping or doing favors for [name of sibling]? How often do you do these kind of things?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder tun fuer ihre Geschwister etwas Nettes wie z.B. ihnen zu helfen oder ihnen einen Gefallen zu tun. Wie oft tust Du solche netten Dinge fuer [Name des befragten Geschwisters]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: Most children are affectionate with their brother or sister sometimes even though they fight at other times. How often are you physically affectionate with [name of sibling] (such as by hugging, kissing, holding hands)?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder gehen liebevoll mit ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester um, auch wenn sie manchmal streiten. Wie oft bist Du liebevoll/zaertlich zu [Name des befragten Geschwisters], z.B. indem Du ihn/sie umarmst, kuesst oder seine/ihre Hand haeltst?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: How about if [name of sibling] is hurt or upset, how often do you try to make [target sibling] feel better?
items.text_de: Wie ist das, wenn [Name des befragten Geschwisters] sich wehgetan hat oder traurig ist, wie oft versuchst Du, ihn/sie zu troesten?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: Some children share secrets with their brothers and sisters and other children don't. How often do you share secrets with [name of sibling]?
items.text_de: Kinder haben manchmal Geheimnisse. Wie oft erzaehlst Du [Name des befragten Geschwisters] Deine Geheimnisse?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: Brothers and sisters sometimes cause trouble or start fights or arguments with one another, even if they love each other a lot. How often would you say that you start fights or cause trouble for [name of sibling]?
items.text_de: Brueder und Schwestern fangen manchmal einen Streit oder eine Rauferei miteinander an, auch wenn sie sich eigentlich sehr lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft zettelst Du einen Streit an oder bringst [Name des befragten Geschwisters] in Schwierigkeiten?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: How often do you feel mad or angry at [name of sibling]?
items.text_de: Wie oft bist Du boese oder wuetend auf [Name des befragten Geschwisters]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: Children sometimes hurt their brother or sister on purpose like by pushing, punching or hitting him or her. How often do you do these kind of things to [name of sibling]?
items.text_de: Kinder tun ihren Geschwistern manchmal absichtlich weh, indem sie sie z.B. schubsen, hauen oder kneifen. Wie oft machst Du so etwas bei [Name des befragten Geschwisters]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: Some children are mean to their brothers or sisters sometimes, even if they really care about them. How often would you say you do things to [name of sibling] like tease, bug or call him or her names?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder sind manchmal gemein zu ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester, auch wenn sie ihn/sie wirklich lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft tust Du solche Dinge, wie [Name des befragten Geschwisters] aergern oder sie/ihn aufzuziehen?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: Many kids complain that their mothers aren't fair about how they treat them compared to how their mothers treat their brothers and sisters. How is this for you? How often do you feel that your mother treats [name of sibling] better than she treats you?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder beschweren sich darueber, dass ihre Muetter sie und ihren Bruder/ihre Schwester nicht gleich behandeln.Wie ist das bei Dir? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass Deine Mutter [Name des befragten Geschwisters] besser behandelt als Dich?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: How about with your father? How often do you feel that he treats [name of sibling] better than he treats you?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass er [Name des befragten Geschwisters] besser behandelt als Dich?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: How about with your mother? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your mother's attention or affection toward [name of sibling]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deiner Mutter? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn Deine Mutter [Name des befragten Geschwisters] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100s
items.text: How about with your father? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your father's attention or affection toward [name of sibling]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn dein Vater [Name des befragten Geschwisters] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

sre0200s.question: sre0200s
sre0200s.name: sre0200s
sre0200s.label: Now some more questions about your relationship with [your twin brother/your twin sister]: What's it like with you and [name of sibling]?

items.name: sre0200s
items.text: Now some more questions about your relationship with [your twin brother/your twin sister]: What's it like with you and [name of sibling]?
items.text_de: Alter = 15 Jahre: Nun kommen einige weitere Fragen zu Deiner Beziehung zu [Deinem Zwillingsbruder/ Deiner Zwillingsschwester]: Wie ist es bei Dir und [Name des befragten Geschwisters]? / ab 16 Jahren: Nun kommen einige weitere Fragen zu Ihrer Beziehung zu [einblenden Ihrem Zwillingsbruder/Ihrer Zwillingsschwester]: Wie ist es bei Ihnen und [Name des befragten Geschwisters]?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Stocker, C. M., Lanthier, R. P., & Furman, W. (1997). Sibling relationships in Early Adulthood. Journal of Family Psychology, 11 (2), 210-221; Heyeres, U. (2006). Adult sibling relationship questionnaire. Gruppendynamik und Organisationsberatung, 37 (2), 215-225.

answers.label: 1: my sibling thinks that I generally get more support.
answers.label_de: 1: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass ich in der Regel mehr unterstuetzt werde.

answers.label: 2: my sibling thinks that I sometimes get more support.
answers.label_de: 2: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass ich manchmal mehr unterstuetzt werde.

answers.label: 3: my sibling thinks that we both get similar support.
answers.label_de: 3: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass wir beide gleichermassen unterstuetzt werden.

answers.label: 4: my sibling thinks that she/he sometimes gets more support.
answers.label_de: 4: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass sie/er manchmal mehr unterstuetzt wird.

answers.label: 5: my sibling thinks that she/he generally gets more support.
answers.label_de: 5: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass sie/er in der Regel mehr unterstuetzt wird.

items.name: sre0400s
items.text: Does [name] think your mother supports him/her or you more?
items.text_de: ab 16 Jahren: Meint [Name des befragten Geschwisters], Ihre Mutter unterstuetze [sie/ihn] oder Sie mehr? / 15 Jahre: Meint [Name des befragten Geschwisters], Deine Mutter unterstuetze [sie/ihn] oder Dich mehr?

items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: What about doing nice things like helping or doing favors for [name of twin 1]? How often do you do these kind of things?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder tun fuer ihre Geschwister etwas Nettes wie z.B. ihnen zu helfen oder ihnen einen Gefallen zu tun. Wie oft tust Du solche netten Dinge fuer [Name des Zwillings 1]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: Most children are affectionate with their brother or sister sometimes even though they fight at other times. How often are you physically affectionate with [name of twin 1] (such as by hugging, kissing, holding hands)?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder gehen liebevoll mit ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester um, auch wenn sie manchmal streiten. Wie oft bist Du liebevoll/zaertlich zu [Name des Zwillings 1], z.B. indem Du ihn/sie umarmst, kuesst oder seine/ihre Hand haeltst?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: How about if [name of twin 1] is hurt or upset, how often do you try to make [twin 1] feel better?
items.text_de: Wie ist das, wenn [Name des Zwillings 1] sich wehgetan hat oder traurig ist, wie oft versuchst Du, ihn/sie zu troesten?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: Some children share secrets with their brothers and sisters and other children don't. How often do you share secrets with [name of twin 1]?
items.text_de: Kinder haben manchmal Geheimnisse. Wie oft erzaehlst Du [Name des Zwillings 1] Deine Geheimnisse?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: Brothers and sisters sometimes cause trouble or start fights or arguments with one another, even if they love each other a lot. How often would you say that you start fights or cause trouble for [name of twin 1]?
items.text_de: Brueder und Schwestern fangen manchmal einen Streit oder eine Rauferei miteinander an, auch wenn sie sich eigentlich sehr lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft zettelst Du einen Streit an oder bringst [Name des Zwillings 1] in Schwierigkeiten?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: How often do you feel mad or angry at [name of twin 1]?
items.text_de: Wie oft bist Du boese oder wuetend auf [Name des Zwillings 1]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: Children sometimes hurt their brother or sister on purpose like by pushing, punching or hitting him or her. How often do you do these kind of things to [name of twin 1]?
items.text_de: Kinder tun ihren Geschwistern manchmal absichtlich weh, indem sie sie z.B. schubsen, hauen oder kneifen. Wie oft machst Du so etwas bei [Name des Zwillings 1]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: Some children are mean to their brothers or sisters sometimes, even if they really care about them. How often would you say you do things to [name of twin 1] like tease, bug or call him or her names?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder sind manchmal gemein zu ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester, auch wenn sie ihn/sie wirklich lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft tust Du solche Dinge, wie [Name des Zwillings 1] aergern oder sie/ihn aufzuziehen?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: Many kids complain that their mothers aren't fair about how they treat them compared to how their mothers treat their brothers and sisters. How is this for you? How often do you feel that your mother treats [name of twin 1] better than she treats you?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder beschweren sich darueber, dass ihre Muetter sie und ihren Bruder/ihre Schwester nicht gleich behandeln.Wie ist das bei Dir? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass Deine Mutter [Name des Zwillings 1] besser behandelt als Dich?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: How about with your father? How often do you feel that he treats [name of twin 1] better than he treats you?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass er [Name des Zwillings 1] besser behandelt als Dich?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: How about with your mother? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your mother's attention or affection toward [name of twin 1]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deiner Mutter? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn Deine Mutter [Name des Zwillings 1] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100t
items.text: How about with your father? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your father's attention or affection toward [name of twin 1]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn dein Vater [Name des Zwillings 1] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

sre0200t.name: sre0200t
sre0200t.label: Now some more questions about your relationship with [your twin brother/your twin sister]: What's it like with you and [name of twin 1]?

items.name: sre0200t

items.text_de: ab 16 Jahren: Meint [Name des Zwillings 1], Ihre Mutter unterstuetze [sie/ihn] oder Sie mehr? / 15 Jahre: Meint [Name des Zwillings 1], Deine Mutter unterstuetze [sie/ihn] oder Dich mehr?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Stocker, C. M., Lanthier, R. P., & Furman, W. (1997). Sibling relationships in Early Adulthood. Journal of Family Psychology, 11 (2), 210-221; Heyeres, U. (2006). Adult sibling relationship questionnaire. Gruppendynamik und Organisationsberatung, 37 (2), 215-225.
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Stocker, C. M., Lanthier, R. P., & Furman, W. (1997). Sibling relationships in Early Adulthood. Journal of Family Psychology, 11 (2), 210-221; Heyeres, U. (2006). Adult sibling relationship questionnaire. Gruppendynamik und Organisationsberatung, 37 (2), 215-225.

answers.label: 1: my sibling thinks that I generally get more support.
answers.label_de: 1: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass ich in der Regel mehr unterstuetzt werde.

answers.label: 2: my sibling thinks that I sometimes get more support.
answers.label_de: 2: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass ich manchmal mehr unterstuetzt werde.

answers.label: 3: my sibling thinks that we both get similar support.
answers.label_de: 3: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass wir beide gleichermassen unterstuetzt werden.

answers.label: 4: my sibling thinks that she/he sometimes gets more support.
answers.label_de: 4: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass sie/er manchmal mehr unterstuetzt wird.

answers.label: 5: my sibling thinks that she/he generally gets more support.
answers.label_de: 5: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass sie/er in der Regel mehr unterstuetzt wird.

answers.label: 1: my sibling thinks that our mother is generally closer with me.
answers.label_de: 1: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass meine Mutter mir in der Regel naehersteht.

answers.label: 2: my sibling thinks that our mother is sometimes closer with me.
answers.label_de: 2: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass meine Mutter mir manchmal naehersteht.

answers.label: 3: my sibling thinks that our mother is equally close with both of us.
answers.label_de: 3: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass meine Mutter uns beiden gleichermassen nahesteht.

answers.label: 4: my sibling thinks that our mother is sometimes closer with her/him.
answers.label_de: 4: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass meine Mutter ihm/ihr manchmal naehersteht.

answers.label: 5: my sibling thinks that our mother is generally closer with her/him.
answers.label_de: 5: Mein Geschwister denkt, dass meine Mutter ihm/ihr in der Regel naehersteht.

sre0100u.question: sre0100u
sre0100u.name: sre0100u
sre0100u.label: What about with you and [name of twin 2]?

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: What about with you and [name of twin 2]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es bei Dir und [Name des Zwillings 2]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: What about doing nice things like helping or doing favors for [name of twin 2]? How often do you do these kind of things?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder tun fuer ihre Geschwister etwas Nettes wie z.B. ihnen zu helfen oder ihnen einen Gefallen zu tun. Wie oft tust Du solche netten Dinge fuer [Name des Zwillings 2]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: Most children are affectionate with their brother or sister sometimes even though they fight at other times. How often are you physically affectionate with [name of twin 2] (such as by hugging, kissing, holding hands)?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder gehen liebevoll mit ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester um, auch wenn sie manchmal streiten. Wie oft bist Du liebevoll/zaertlich zu [Name des Zwillings 2], z.B. indem Du ihn/sie umarmst, kuesst oder seine/ihre Hand haeltst?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: How about if [name of twin 2] is hurt or upset, how often do you try to make [twin 2] feel better?
items.text_de: Wie ist das, wenn [Name des Zwillings 2] sich wehgetan hat oder traurig ist, wie oft versuchst Du, ihn/sie zu troesten?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: Some children share secrets with their brothers and sisters and other children don't. How often do you share secrets with [name of twin 2]?
items.text_de: Kinder haben manchmal Geheimnisse. Wie oft erzaehlst Du [Name des Zwillings 2] Deine Geheimnisse?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: Brothers and sisters sometimes cause trouble or start fights or arguments with one another, even if they love each other a lot. How often would you say that you start fights or cause trouble for [name of twin 2]?
items.text_de: Brueder und Schwestern fangen manchmal einen Streit oder eine Rauferei miteinander an, auch wenn sie sich eigentlich sehr lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft zettelst Du einen Streit an oder bringst [Name des Zwillings 2] in Schwierigkeiten?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: How often do you feel mad or angry at [name of twin 2]?
items.text_de: Wie oft bist Du boese oder wuetend auf [Name des Zwillings 2]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: Children sometimes hurt their brother or sister on purpose like by pushing, punching or hitting him or her. How often do you do these kind of things to [name of twin 2]?
items.text_de: Kinder tun ihren Geschwistern manchmal absichtlich weh, indem sie sie z.B. schubsen, hauen oder kneifen. Wie oft machst Du so etwas bei [Name des Zwillings 2]?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: Some children are mean to their brothers or sisters sometimes, even if they really care about them. How often would you say you do things to [name of twin 2] like tease, bug or call him or her names?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder sind manchmal gemein zu ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester, auch wenn sie ihn/sie wirklich lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft tust Du solche Dinge, wie [Name des Zwillings 2] aergern oder sie/ihn aufzuziehen?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: Many kids complain that their mothers aren't fair about how they treat them compared to how their mothers treat their brothers and sisters. How is this for you? How often do you feel that your mother treats [name of twin 2] better than she treats you?
items.text_de: Manche Kinder beschweren sich darueber, dass ihre Muetter sie und ihren Bruder/ihre Schwester nicht gleich behandeln.Wie ist das bei Dir? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass Deine Mutter [Name des Zwillings 2] besser behandelt als Dich?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: How about with your father? How often do you feel that he treats [name of twin 2] better than he treats you?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass er [Name des Zwillings 2] besser behandelt als Dich?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
items.description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

items.name: sre0100u
items.text: How about with your mother? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your mother's attention or affection toward [name of twin 2]?
items.text_de: Wie ist es mit Deiner Mutter? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn Deine Mutter [Name des Zwillings 2] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
items.description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
